text: Neus Català i Pallejà (6 October 1915 – 13 April 2019) was a Spanish Resistance fighter and political activist. She was a member of the Unified Socialist Party of Catalonia (, PSUC) during the Spanish Civil War. She was the only Catalan survivor of the concentration camp of Ravensbrück. Català was born in Els Guiamets, Catalonia. She turned 100 in October 2015. She died on 13 April 2019, at the age of 103. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1915 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish centenarians Category:Communist politicians Category:People from Catalonia Category:Spanish activists Category:World War II resistance members
title: Neus Català
